title: Woodson The Negro in Our History - purpose

content.question: According to the source, which of the following best explains the purpose in founding the Association for the Study of Negro Life and History?

choices.label: To help document the history and contributions of people of African descent and therefore improve how they are perceived and treated
To serve as a meeting place for African American intellectuals to work on their research free from the discriminatory and racially charged gazes of people of other races
To inspire other African American leaders to create avenues for creative and artistic expression that are comparable to the association Woodson founded
To help inform research at historically Black colleges and universities so that they can compete for grants and other funding with predominantly white institutions of higher education

content.answer: To help document the history and contributions of people of African descent and therefore improve how they are perceived and treated

topic.text: 3.15: Black History Education and African American Studies
